thread.title: WATCH: The Rockettes Perform at the Trump Inaugural Ball
thread.title_full: WATCH: The Rockettes Perform at the Trump Inaugural Ball

author: Justin Baragona
title: WATCH: The Rockettes Perform at the Trump Inaugural Ball
text:
WATCH: The Rockettes Perform at the Trump Inaugural Ball by Justin Baragona | 8:41   Video 
Watch their second performance below: 
Tonight at Donald Trumpâ€™s Inaugural Ball, after much controversy, we got to see the Rockettes perform. 
As you may recall, it was announced last month that member of the Rockettes were being forced to perform at the inauguration, even if they wanted to object and not attend. 
Producers for the dance troupe would later state that participation was voluntary. 
Watch the performance above.
